<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mesmerizing Opal](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2984)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 266 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This silver-bound opal pendant is afire with iridescence. When you activate it, attempt a Deception check to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48). If the outcome is a success, you get a critical success instead. If the outcome is a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
